55 /* When elevation is enabled, FFT buffers can hold a maximum of 64 objects.
56  A: Hwa memory size (M3) = 16K
57  B: Azimuth FFT size = 64
58  C: Complex sample size = 4
59  Maximum number of objects = A / (B*C) = 64*/
60 #define MMW_MAX_OBJ_ELEVATION 64
61 
62 
66 uint32_t MmwDemo_peakGrouping(uint32_t numDetectedObjects,
67  uint16_t* detBuffptr,
68  cfarDetOutput_t* cfarObjptr,
69  uint32_t* fftBuffptr,
70  MmwDemo_detectedObj *objOut,
71  uint32_t *peakGrpAzimOut,
72  uint32_t *peakGrpElevOut,
73  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
74  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
75  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
76  uint32_t minRangeIdx,
77  uint32_t maxRangeIdx,
78  uint32_t groupInDopplerDirection,
79  uint32_t groupInRangeDirection)
80 {
81  uint32_t i, j, numObjOut = 0;
82  uint32_t volatile rangeIdx, dopplerIdx;
83  uint16_t *tempPtr;
84  uint16_t kernel[9], detectedObjFlag;
85  uint32_t *srcPtr;
86  int32_t k, l;
87  uint32_t numVirtualAnt = numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev;
88  uint32_t startInd, stepInd, endInd;
89  uint32_t noGrouping = 0;
90  int32_t rowStart, rowEnd;
91 
92  if ((groupInDopplerDirection == 1) && (groupInRangeDirection == 1))
93  {
94  /* Grouping both in Range and Doppler direction */
95  startInd = 0;
96  stepInd = 1;
97  endInd = 8;
98  }
99  else if ((groupInDopplerDirection == 0) && (groupInRangeDirection == 1))
100  {
101  /* Grouping only in Range direction */
102  startInd = 1;
103  stepInd = 3;
104  endInd = 7;
105  }
106  else if ((groupInDopplerDirection == 1) && (groupInRangeDirection == 0))
107  {
108  /* Grouping only in Doppler direction */
109  startInd = 3;
110  stepInd = 1;
111  endInd = 5;
112  }
113  else
114  {
115  noGrouping = 1;
116  }
117 
118  for(i = 0; i < numDetectedObjects; i++)
119  {
120  rangeIdx = cfarObjptr->rangeIdx;
121  dopplerIdx = cfarObjptr->dopplerIdx;
122  if (noGrouping)
123  {
124  if((rangeIdx <= maxRangeIdx) && (rangeIdx >= minRangeIdx))
125  {
126  detectedObjFlag = 1;
127  }
128  else
129  {
130  detectedObjFlag = 0;
131  }
132  }
133  else
134  {
135  detectedObjFlag = 0;
136  if((rangeIdx <= maxRangeIdx) && (rangeIdx >= minRangeIdx) &&
137  (dopplerIdx < numDopplerBins))
138  {
139  detectedObjFlag = 1;
140 
141  /***local maxima check for near by objects****/
142  tempPtr = detBuffptr + (rangeIdx-1)*numDopplerBins;
143  rowStart = 0;
144  rowEnd = 2;
145 
146  if (rangeIdx == minRangeIdx)
147  {
148  tempPtr = detBuffptr + (rangeIdx)*numDopplerBins;
149  rowStart = 1;
150  memset((void *) kernel, 0, 3 * sizeof(uint16_t));
151  }
152  else if (rangeIdx == maxRangeIdx)
153  {
154  rowEnd = 1;
155  memset((void *) &kernel[6], 0, 3 * sizeof(uint16_t));
156  }
157 
158  for (j = rowStart; j <= rowEnd; j++)
159  {
160  for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
161  {
162  l = dopplerIdx + (k - 1);
163  if(l < 0)
164  {
165  l += numDopplerBins;
166  }
167  else if(l >= numDopplerBins)
168  {
169  l -= numDopplerBins;
170  }
171  kernel[j*3+k] = tempPtr[l];
172  }
173  tempPtr += numDopplerBins;
174  }
175  for (k = startInd; k <= endInd; k += stepInd)
176  {
177  if(kernel[k] > kernel[4])
178  {
179  detectedObjFlag = 0;
180  }
181  }
182  }
183  }
184  if(detectedObjFlag == 1)
185  {
186  if(peakGrpAzimOut != NULL)
187  {
188  srcPtr = (uint32_t*) &fftBuffptr[(numVirtualAnt * numDopplerBins * rangeIdx + numVirtualAnt * dopplerIdx)];
189 
190  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
191  for(j = 0; j < numVirtualAntAzim; j++)
192  {
193  *peakGrpAzimOut++ = *srcPtr++;
194  }
195 
196  if(peakGrpElevOut != NULL)
197  {
198  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
199  for(j = 0; j < numVirtualAntElev; j++)
200  {
201  *peakGrpElevOut++ = *srcPtr++;
202  }
203  }
204  }
205 
206  /* Save range and doppler index */
207  objOut[numObjOut].rangeIdx = rangeIdx;
208  objOut[numObjOut].dopplerIdx = dopplerIdx;
209 
210  numObjOut++;
211  }
212 
213  cfarObjptr++;
214 
215  if(numVirtualAntElev > 0)
216  {
217  if(numObjOut >= MMW_MAX_OBJ_ELEVATION)
218  {
219  break;
220  }
221  }
222  else
223  {
224  if(numObjOut >= MMW_MAX_OBJ_OUT)
225  {
226  break;
227  }
228  }
229  }
230 
231  return(numObjOut);
232 }
233 
248 static void MmwDemo_dopplerComp
249 (
250  cmplx16ImRe_t *in,
251  cmplx16ImRe_t *out,
252  float Cos,
253  float Sin
254 )
255 {
256  float yRe, yIm;
257 
258  /* Rotate symbol (correct the phase) */
259  yRe = in->real * Cos + in->imag * Sin;
260  yIm = in->imag * Cos - in->real * Sin;
261  out->real = (int16_t) yRe;
262  out->imag = (int16_t) yIm;
263 }
264 
277 static float MmwDemo_calcCompIdx
278 (
279  uint16_t dopplerIdx,
280  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
281  uint32_t numTxAnt
282 )
283 {
284  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
285 
286  /* Doppler compensation index calculation */
287  if (dopplerIdx >= numDopplerBins/2)
288  {
289  dopplerCompensationIdx = ((int32_t) dopplerIdx - (int32_t) numDopplerBins);
290  }
291  else
292  {
293  dopplerCompensationIdx = dopplerIdx;
294  }
295 
296  /* Doppler phase correction is 1/2 or (1/3 in elevation case) of the phase between two chirps of the same antenna */
297  dopplerCompensationIdx = dopplerCompensationIdx / (float) numTxAnt;
298  if (dopplerCompensationIdx < 0)
299  {
300  dopplerCompensationIdx += (float) numDopplerBins;
301  }
302 
303  return dopplerCompensationIdx;
304 }
305 
306 void MmwDemo_dopplerCompensation
307 (
308  uint32_t numDetectedObjects,
309  uint32_t *srcPtrAzim,
310  uint32_t *srcPtrElev,
311  MmwDemo_detectedObj *objOut,
312  uint32_t *dstPtrAzim,
313  uint32_t *dstPtrElev,
314  uint32_t numTxAnt,
315  uint32_t numRxAnt,
316  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
317  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
318  uint32_t numDopplerBins
319 )
320 {
321  uint32_t index;
322  uint32_t j;
323  uint16_t dopplerIdx;
324  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
325 
326  for(index = 0; index < numDetectedObjects; index ++)
327  {
328  dopplerIdx = objOut->dopplerIdx;
329 
330  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
331  for(j = 0; j < numRxAnt; j++)
332  {
333  *dstPtrAzim++ = *srcPtrAzim++;
334  }
335 
336  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx1) */
337  if (numVirtualAntAzim > numRxAnt)
338  {
339  float Cos,Sin;
340 
341  dopplerCompensationIdx = MmwDemo_calcCompIdx(dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins, numTxAnt);
342 
343  Cos = cos(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
344  Sin = sin(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
345 
346  for(j = numRxAnt; j < numVirtualAntAzim; j++)
347  {
348  MmwDemo_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)srcPtrAzim++, (cmplx16ImRe_t *)dstPtrAzim++, Cos, Sin);
349  }
350 
351  if (numVirtualAntElev > 0)
352  {
353  /* transfer data corresponding to elevation virtual antennas, (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx2) */
354  float Cos2, Sin2;
355  /* Doppler phase shift is 2/3 */
356  Cos2 = Cos * Cos - Sin * Sin;
357  Sin2 = 2 * Cos * Sin;
358  for(j = 0; j < numVirtualAntElev; j++)
359  {
360  MmwDemo_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)srcPtrElev++, (cmplx16ImRe_t *)dstPtrElev++, Cos2, Sin2);
361  }
362  }
363  }
364  objOut++;
365  }
366 }
367 
368 void MmwDemo_azimHeapMapDopplerCompensation
369 (
370  cmplx16ImRe_t *azimuthHeapMap,
371  uint16_t dopplerIdx,
372  uint32_t numTxAnt,
373  uint32_t numRxAnt,
374  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
375  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
376  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
377  uint32_t numRangeBins
378 )
379 {
380  uint32_t index;
381  uint32_t j;
382  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
383  float Cos,Sin;
384  float Cos2, Sin2;
385 
386  dopplerCompensationIdx = MmwDemo_calcCompIdx(dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins, numTxAnt);
387 
388  Cos = cos(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
389  Sin = sin(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
390 
391  /* Doppler phase shift is 2/3 */
392  Cos2 = Cos * Cos - Sin * Sin;
393  Sin2 = 2 * Cos * Sin;
394 
395  for(index = 0; index < numRangeBins; index ++)
396  {
397  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
398  for(j = 0; j < numRxAnt; j++)
399  {
400  /* Skip data, no compensation is needed */
401  azimuthHeapMap++;
402  }
403 
404  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx1) */
405  for(j = numRxAnt; j < numVirtualAntAzim; j++)
406  {
407  MmwDemo_dopplerComp(azimuthHeapMap, azimuthHeapMap, Cos, Sin);
408  azimuthHeapMap++;
409  }
410  for(j = 0; j < numVirtualAntElev; j++)
411  {
412  MmwDemo_dopplerComp(azimuthHeapMap, azimuthHeapMap, Cos2, Sin2);
413  azimuthHeapMap++;
414  }
415  }
416 }
417 
418 
419 void MmwDemo_XYZestimation(uint16_t *azimFFTPtr,
420  uint16_t *elevFFTPtr,
421  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj,
422  uint32_t objOutIndx,
423  uint32_t FFTIndx)
424 {
425  uint32_t maxIdx;
426  int32_t sMaxIdx;
427  float temp;
428  float Wx, Wz;
429  float range;
430  float x, y, z;
431  float peakAzimRe, peakAzimIm, peakElevRe, peakElevIm;
432  MmwDemo_detectedObj *objOut = &obj->objOut[0];
433  uint32_t numAngleBins = obj->numAngleBins;
434  uint32_t xyzOutputQFormat = obj->xyzOutputQFormat;
435 #define ONE_QFORMAT (1 << xyzOutputQFormat)
436 
437  maxIdx = obj->detObj2dAzimIdx[objOutIndx];
438 
439  if (obj->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
440  {
441  peakAzimIm = (float) ((int16_t) (*(azimFFTPtr + FFTIndx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2)));
442  peakAzimRe = (float) ((int16_t) (*(azimFFTPtr + FFTIndx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2+1)));
443  peakElevIm = (float) ((int16_t) (*(elevFFTPtr + FFTIndx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2)));
444  peakElevRe = (float) ((int16_t) (*(elevFFTPtr + FFTIndx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2+1)));
445  }
446 
447 #ifdef MMW_ENABLE_NEGATIVE_FREQ_SLOPE
448  if (obj->rangeResolution > 0)
449  {
450  range = objOut[objOutIndx].rangeIdx * obj->rangeResolution;
451  }
452  else
453  {
454  objOut[objOutIndx].rangeIdx = (uint16_t) ((int32_t) obj->numRangeBins - (int32_t) objOut[objOutIndx].rangeIdx);
455  range = objOut[objOutIndx].rangeIdx * -obj->rangeResolution;
456  }
457 #else
458  range = objOut[objOutIndx].rangeIdx * obj->rangeResolution;
459 #endif
460 
461 
462  /* Compensate for range bias */
463  range -= obj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg.rangeBias;
464  if (range < 0)
465  {
466  range = 0;
467  }
468 
469  if(maxIdx > (numAngleBins/2 -1))
470  {
471  sMaxIdx = maxIdx - numAngleBins;
472  }
473  else
474  {
475  sMaxIdx = maxIdx;
476  }
477 
478  Wx = 2 * (float) sMaxIdx / numAngleBins;
479  x = range * Wx;
480 
481  if (obj->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
482  {
483  Wz = atan2(peakAzimIm * peakElevRe - peakAzimRe * peakElevIm,
484  peakAzimRe * peakElevRe + peakAzimIm * peakElevIm)/PI_ + (2 * Wx);
485  if (Wz > 1)
486  {
487  Wz = Wz - 2;
488  }
489  else if (Wz < -1)
490  {
491  Wz = Wz + 2;
492  }
493  z = range * Wz;
494  /*record wz for debugging/testing*/
495  if(objOutIndx < MMW_MAX_ELEV_OBJ_DEBUG)
496  {
497  obj->detObjElevationAngle[objOutIndx] = Wz;
498  }
499 
500  }
501  else
502  {
503  z = 0;
504  }
505 
506  temp = range*range -x*x -z*z;
507  if (temp > 0)
508  {
509  y = sqrt(temp);
510  }
511  else
512  {
513  y = 0;
514  }
515 
516  if(x < 0)
517  {
518  objOut[objOutIndx].x = (int16_t) (x * ONE_QFORMAT - 0.5);
519  }
520  else
521  {
522  objOut[objOutIndx].x = (int16_t) (x * ONE_QFORMAT + 0.5);
523  }
524  if(y < 0)
525  {
526  objOut[objOutIndx].y = (int16_t) (y * ONE_QFORMAT - 0.5);
527  }
528  else
529  {
530  objOut[objOutIndx].y = (int16_t) (y * ONE_QFORMAT + 0.5);
531  }
532  if(z < 0)
533  {
534  objOut[objOutIndx].z = (int16_t) (z * ONE_QFORMAT - 0.5);
535  }
536  else
537  {
538  objOut[objOutIndx].z = (int16_t) (z * ONE_QFORMAT + 0.5);
539  }
540 }
541 
542 
543 void angleEstimationAzimElev(uint16_t *azimFFTAbsPtr,
544  uint16_t *azimFFTPtr,
545  uint16_t *elevFFTPtr,
546  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
547 {
548  uint32_t i, j, maxVal = 0,maxIdx = 0, tempVal;
549  MmwDemo_detectedObj *objOut = &obj->objOut[0];
550  uint32_t numAngleBins = obj->numAngleBins;
551  uint16_t *origAzimFFTAbsPtr;
552  uint16_t maxNumObj = MMW_MAX_OBJ_OUT;
553 
554  if(obj->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
555  {
556  maxNumObj = MMW_MAX_OBJ_ELEVATION;
557  }
558 
559 
560  /*Initialize the number of objects to the value received as input.
561  The value received as input will change if more than one object
562  per azimuth is detected*/
563  uint32_t numObjOut = obj->numObjOut;
564 
565  for(i=0; i < numObjOut; i++)
566  {
567 
568  maxVal = 0;
569  /* For this detected object, save starting point of "FFT absolute array",
570  to be used later for the detection of the second azimuth on the same
571  range and doppler*/
572  origAzimFFTAbsPtr = azimFFTAbsPtr;
573  for(j=0; j < numAngleBins; j++)
574  {
575  tempVal = *azimFFTAbsPtr++;
576  if(tempVal > maxVal)
577  {
578  maxVal = tempVal;
579  maxIdx = j;
580  }
581  }
582 
583  objOut[i].peakVal = maxVal;
584  obj->detObj2dAzimIdx[i] = maxIdx;
585 
586  /* Estimate x,y,z */
587  MmwDemo_XYZestimation(azimFFTPtr, elevFFTPtr, obj, i, i);
588 
589  /* Multi peak azimuzth search?*/
590  if (obj->cliCfg->multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
591  {
592  uint32_t leftSearchIdx;
593  uint32_t rightSearchIdx;
594  uint32_t secondSearchLen;
595  uint32_t iModAzimLen;
596  uint32_t maxVal2;
597  int32_t k;
598  uint32_t t;
599  uint32_t secondPeakObjIndex;
600  uint16_t azimIdx=obj->detObj2dAzimIdx[i];
601  uint16_t* azimuthMag = origAzimFFTAbsPtr;
602 
603  /* Find right edge of the first peak */
604  t = azimIdx;
605  leftSearchIdx = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
606  k = numAngleBins;
607  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
608  {
609  t = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
610  leftSearchIdx = (leftSearchIdx + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
611  k--;
612  }
613 
614  /* Find left edge of the first peak */
615  t = azimIdx;
616  rightSearchIdx = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
617  k = numAngleBins;
618  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[rightSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
619  {
620  t = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
621  rightSearchIdx = (rightSearchIdx - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
622  k--;
623  }
624 
625  secondSearchLen = ((rightSearchIdx - leftSearchIdx) & (numAngleBins-1)) + 1;
626  /* Find second peak */
627  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx];
628  azimIdx = leftSearchIdx;
629  for (t = leftSearchIdx; t < (leftSearchIdx + secondSearchLen); t++)
630  {
631  iModAzimLen = t & (numAngleBins-1);
632  if (azimuthMag[iModAzimLen] > maxVal2)
633  {
634  azimIdx = iModAzimLen;
635  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[iModAzimLen];
636  }
637  }
638  /* Is second peak greater than threshold? */
639  if ( (maxVal2 >( ((uint32_t)(maxVal * obj->cliCfg->multiObjBeamFormingCfg.multiPeakThrsScal)))) && (obj->numObjOut < maxNumObj) )
640  {
641  /* Second peak detected! Add it to the end of the list */
642  secondPeakObjIndex = obj->numObjOut;
643  obj->numObjOut++;
644 
645  /* Update second peak with same range and doppler as first peak*/
646  objOut[secondPeakObjIndex].dopplerIdx = objOut[i].dopplerIdx;
647  objOut[secondPeakObjIndex].rangeIdx = objOut[i].rangeIdx;
648  /* Update second peak with peak value*/
649  objOut[secondPeakObjIndex].peakVal = maxVal2;
650 
651  /* Save azimuth index */
652  obj->detObj2dAzimIdx[secondPeakObjIndex] = azimIdx;
653 
654  /* Estimate x,y,z for second peak */
655  MmwDemo_XYZestimation(azimFFTPtr, elevFFTPtr, obj,
656  secondPeakObjIndex, i/*FFTIndx for second peak is the same one used for the first peak*/);
657  }
658  }
659  }
660 }
661 
670 uint32_t calcNoiseFloor(uint32_t *radarCubedMemPtr,
671  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
672  uint32_t numRangeBins,
673  uint32_t numVirtualAnt)
674 {
675  uint32_t sumNoiseEnergy = 0;
676  int16_t * srcPtr;
677  int32_t dopplerIdx, rangeIdx, antIdx;
678 
679  for (rangeIdx = 0; rangeIdx < numRangeBins; rangeIdx++)
680  {
681  for (dopplerIdx = numDopplerBins/2-2; dopplerIdx <= numDopplerBins/2-1; dopplerIdx++)
682  {
683  srcPtr = (int16_t*) &radarCubedMemPtr[numVirtualAnt * dopplerIdx +
684  numVirtualAnt * numDopplerBins * rangeIdx];
685  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < (2 * numVirtualAnt); antIdx++)
686  {
687  sumNoiseEnergy += (*srcPtr) * (*srcPtr);
688  srcPtr++;
689  }
690  }
691  }
692 
693  return(sumNoiseEnergy);
694 }

MmwDemo_peakGrouping
uint32_t MmwDemo_peakGrouping(uint32_t numDetectedObjects, uint16_t *detBuffptr, cfarDetOutput_t *cfarObjptr, uint32_t *fftBuffptr, MmwDemo_detectedObj *objOut, uint32_t *peakGrpAzimOut, uint32_t *peakGrpElevOut, uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim, uint32_t numVirtualAntElev, uint32_t numDopplerBins, uint32_t minRangeIdx, uint32_t maxRangeIdx, uint32_t groupInDopplerDirection, uint32_t groupInRangeDirection)

MmwDemo_DataPathObj_t::detObj2dAzimIdx
